name: Luocha

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

story: Carrying a coffin wherever he goes, he is a foreign trader who came from beyond the stellar seas.Has excellent medical skills.

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

skills.name: Thorns of the Abyss
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower
skills.description: Restores a single ally's HP and gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

skills.name: Death Wish
skills.description: Removes 1 buff from all enemies, deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, and gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

skills.name: Cycle of Life
skills.description: Deploys a Field when Abyss Flower reaches 2 stacks. While the Field is active, allies will restore HP after they attack.

skills.name: Mercy of a Fool
skills.description: After the Technique is used, immediately trigger the effect of the Talent at the start of the next battle.

eidolons.name: Ablution of the Quick
eidolons.description: While the Field is active, ATK of all allies increases by 20%.

eidolons.name: Bestowal From the Pure
eidolons.description: When his Skill is triggered, if the target ally's HP is lower than 50%, Luocha's Outgoing Healing increases by 30%. If the target ally's HP is at 50% or higher, the ally receives a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of Luocha's ATK plus 240, lasting for 2 turns.

eidolons.name: Surveyal by the Fool
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Heavy Lies the Crown
eidolons.description: When Luocha's Field is active, enemies become Weakened and deal 12% less DMG.

eidolons.name: Cicatrix 'Neath the Pain
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Reunion With the Dust
eidolons.description: When Ultimate is used, there is a 100% fixed chance to reduce all enemies' All-Type RES by 20% for 2 turn(s).
